title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2025-1189: Important priority package update for microcode_ctl
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2025-20109:
	Improper Isolation or Compartmentalization in the stream cache mechanism for some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
